tool_description: Makes final qualification decisions based on composite scores, criteria matches, and business rules to categorize leads as qualified, unqualified, or nurture-ready.

composite_score.description: Composite lead score from scoring system (0-100)

criteria_match_status.description: Criteria matching result: passed, failed, or partial

qualification_logic.description: Decision logic: score_only, criteria_only, score_and_criteria, or score_or_criteria

nurture_score_range.description: Score range for nurture classification [min, max]

error_messages: Invalid composite score: composite_score must be between 0 and 100.
Invalid criteria match status: Use one of [passed, failed, partial].
Invalid score threshold: minimum_score_threshold must be between 0 and 100.
Invalid qualification logic: Use one of [score_only, criteria_only, score_and_criteria, score_or_criteria].
Invalid nurture range: nurture_score_range must contain exactly 2 numbers with min < max.
usage: Provide composite_score and criteria_match_status from previous scoring and matching steps. Configure minimum_score_threshold, qualification_logic, and nurture_score_range based on business requirements.

qualification_decision.description: Final qualification status: qualified, unqualified, or nurture

decision_rationale.description: Explanation of qualification decision logic and factors

next_action_recommended.description: Recommended next step based on qualification result
